title: Copy and Paste responses....
body:
Ran into a player in champ select who basically said sub to youtube and any new dislikes will result in feeding and losing the game.

Sent this report to riot, and got a copy and paste response. Can you guys pull your heads out of your ass, and actually do something, i can't report for something in champ select at the end of the game, and i'm not willing to waste 35 mins for a game to end because one %%%% decides he wants to int.

If you're gonna allow us to report via support, actually have a connection with the people sending you reports, that shit should be as intolerable as the No-No words

replies.body: They use macro responses for player reports because they cannot release any info regarding punishments because of various reasons privacy included. All they can really say is "we've looked into it thanks for the report" so that is all they say. They could personalise the crap out of it but ultimately they still wouldn't be giving you the info you want.
no no words are easier to punish than trolls and bots.
Was pre a norms game, haven't had one of "those" people since mid season 5 :/
I haven't seen them in a while, is this in ranked or normal games?

We are implementing Personal support agents that assist you in your Queries Soonâ„¢, however for now the automated support tickets are the way of the future, as your support ticket is automatically read and replied to within 24 hours, which is a new record for Rito Games.
